meaning: cause, factor, be associated with, depend on, be limited to

onyomiExamples.meaning: cause, factor, hetu (direct cause, esp. as opposed to indirect conditions), the basis of one's argument (in hetuvidya)
fate, destiny, connection, tie, bond, origin, pretext, justification, hetu and prataya (direct causes and indirect conditions, which underlie the actions of all things)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be due to, to be caused by, to depend on, to turn on, to be based on, to come from, to be based at (a location, an organization), to be headquartered at

kunyomiExamples.reading: よるところがおおきい
kunyomiExamples.meaning: depending largely on, playing a large role in, due largely to
to be associated (with), to be connected (with)
